products.title: Caldicot Woven Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Full of texture and full of simple comfort, the caldicot woven grey roman blind is a true delight, bringing a drop of warmth and magic to any room that it touches. The opposing grey tones are barely separable, complimenting each other with such ease and elegance, its like the full of texture and full of simple comfort, the caldicot woven grey roman blind is a true delight, bringing a drop of warmth and magic to any room that it touches.

products.title: Luna Blackout Graphite Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Luna blackoutgraphite grey perfect fit pleated blind. Part of ourluna blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Verona Vision Platinum Day And Night Blind
products.description: Revive your interior with the sleek verona vision platinum day and night roller blind. With a funky slatted look combining horizontal strips of light silver polyester fabric and voile, this blind will visually enhance any contemporary space, whilst the innovative design is highly versatile when it comes to adjusting the light and privacy levels in your room. products.title: Sio Charcoal Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Delicate yet dark and sophisticated, the sio charcoal roller blind will make a decidedly glamorous addition to your space. Golden stems gracefully snake across a brooding charcoal grey backdrop, giving length and flow to the print and an alluring exotic vibe. Expertly printed on durable dimout fabric, this roller blind will work well in a room with dark, rich colours, velvet fabrics and gold or copper accents.
